title: Patcher Wont Update!!!
body:
Please Help Me! ever since patch 5.3 my league patcher will instantly drop to 0 kbps and it will not scan files meaning the main percent doesn't go up ;c
please if know anything that may help please comment on this! 

(i am dieing to play league)

replies.body:
Try the following:

Open up your patcher and let it get to the point where the speed drops to 0 kbps.

Disconnect your internet for ten seconds, and then reconnect it. Wait five minutes.

It should start downloading again.
